name: Tomy Car Drive Shutsudou! Kinkyuu Sharyou Hen
overview: You can play Tomica Town by driving "police car", "fire truck", "ambulance". You can play with different games for each car. Easy operation! ! I will play with the Wii remote like a handle. Two people can play the game, 2P can do 1P support by operation other than driving. "Police car" catches cars that violated traffic rules chasing. "Fire truck" is a game heading by fire truck to the scene of a fire, putting water on fire. Two people can play games that turn off the fire. "Ambulance" is a game that carries an injured person to an hospital with an ambulance. At the beginning of each game, you can only play "simple" mode, but by playing the game new modes of the game will increase. As you clear the game, you can get a cool Tomica card for your reward. Play with fun and let's have all 12 types of Tomica cards.
